org.springframework.data.mapping

接口 PersistentPropertyAccessor

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ConvertingPropertyAccessor

    public interface PersistentPropertyAccessor
    Domain service to allow accessing and setting PersistentPropertys of an entity. Usually obtained through PersistentEntity.getPropertyAccessor(Object). In case type conversion shall be applied on property access, use a ConvertingPropertyAccessor.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.10
    另请参阅:
    PersistentEntity.getPropertyAccessor(Object), ConvertingPropertyAccessor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object getBean()
      Returns the underlying bean.
      Object getProperty(PersistentProperty<?> property)
      Returns the value of the given PersistentProperty of the underlying bean instance.
      void setProperty(PersistentProperty<?> property, Object value)
      Sets the given PersistentProperty to the given value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(PersistentProperty<?> property,
                 @Nullable
                 Object value)
        Sets the given PersistentProperty to the given value. Will do type conversion if a ConversionService is configured.
        参数:
        property - must not be null.
        value - can be null.
        抛出:
        MappingException - in case an exception occurred when setting the property value.

      • getProperty

        @Nullable
Object getProperty(PersistentProperty<?> property)
        Returns the value of the given PersistentProperty of the underlying bean instance.
        参数:
        property - must not be null.
        返回:
        can be null.

      • getBean

        Object getBean()
        Returns the underlying bean.
        返回:
        will never be null.
